page.title: 17Village Life.
page.content: Chelsfield Village has many different clubs,societies and institutes all thriving and catering for the needs of village life. {The Chelsfield (afternoon)Women's Institute} has a healthy membership and organises many charitable events and entertainments throughout the year. {Chelsfield Village Players} produce and present a variety of plays and theatrical events both in the Village Hall and out of doors. {The Beavers,Cubs,Brownies and Guides} look after the needs of the younger members of the village community. {The Ever Greens} is an active and well attended club held at the Rectory for the senior members of the village. {The Ladies Art Club} runs on Thursday afternoons throughout the autumn,spring and summer in the Village Hall.
